name: Garden of Eating
description:
The Garden of Eating began as a clone of the classic Snake game, written in C++ using  SFML (Simple and Fast Multimedia Library).  It grew into a more complete game with a story mode, with the ability to create your own campaigns with any text editor.

In the campaign called Adam's Revenge, you play as the snake from the Garden of Eating.  Adam is angry at you for tricking Eve into eating the apple from the forbidden tree, and has trapped you in his gambit!  Navigate through nine mazes of increasing difficulty to escape his clutches!

See the gamedev.net project page, or the GitHub repo for the complete source code.
